name: FreeChicken
description:
The main character, Free Chicken, was taking a peaceful walk with his family as usual.
Meanwhile, he falls into a suspicious pit alone.
A dangerous story unfolds there! He must escape to return to his family.
As he escapes, Free Chicken collects mysterious pieces of memory and learns terrible facts.

Will Free Chicken, as his name suggests, be able to find his freedom and return to his peaceful hometown?
Are you ready to go on an adventure with Free Chicken?

Main features


**Avoid various obstacles with precise control.**

**Go beyond your limits with continued challenges.**

**Go on an adventure to experience a fun and relatable story.**
